section.title: Minimal requirements
section.para: As was mentioned in , the main requirement is having Java Development Kit version 8 installed in your environment. In case you have troubles installing Java, please search some tutorials on installing JDK on your operating system on YouTube. There are plenty of useful videos on this topic.
Other requirements on the hardware depend on what you expect from PerfCake. The memory and CPU power demands depand mainly on your performance scenario.
Up to our knowledge all components of PerfCake work offline without an Internet connection. This is our intent, please report a bug should you have different findings.
